titleStmt.title: The eagle-trussers elegie a tract bewailing the losse of that incomparable generalissimo Gustavus Adolphus, the great King of Sweden, who after manifold and glorious victories left his life also triumphantly and laureated at the famous Battle of Lutzen, the sixth of November, anno 1632. By G.T. Esq;
titleStmt.author: G. T. (George Tooke), 1595-1675.

titleStmt.title: The eagle-trussers elegie a tract bewailing the losse of that incomparable generalissimo Gustavus Adolphus, the great King of Sweden, who after manifold and glorious victories left his life also triumphantly and laureated at the famous Battle of Lutzen, the sixth of November, anno 1632. By G.T. Esq;
titleStmt.author: G. T. (George Tooke), 1595-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Charls Webb at the Boare's Head in St Paul's Church-yard,

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Gustaf King of Sweden, II Adolf,
